scripts.build-css: cat styles/mapbox.css styles/fonts.css styles/layout.css styles/modules.css > dist/site.css
scripts.watch-css: catw styles/mapbox.css styles/fonts.css styles/layout.css styles/modules.css -o dist/site.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-css
